tutorial.speak:
In the B1.church Admin dashboard click on the Donations icon.
The Donation Summary is shown by default. You can choose whatever dates you would like to show. Click "Run Report".
To download a CSV of the Donation Summary click the download icon. This will produce a dropdown menu with three options.
Click on "Sample Word Template" to download a template for creating donor reports.
You can also choose "Summary" or "Detailed Report" from this menu to download CSV files for further processing.
Click on the "Batches" tab to view individual donation batches. You can see the batch name, date, number of donations, and total amount. Click on the download icon to export batch data.
The batches list shows all donation batches with their details.
Click on a batch name to view its details. You can click "Edit Batch" to modify batch information.
Within a batch, you can click the "Edit" button next to individual donations to modify donation details.
In the edit view, you can modify the batch name, date, and other details, then click "Save" to save your changes.
Click on the "Funds" tab to manage donation funds and categories. Click "Add Fund" to create a new fund.
The Funds page shows all available funds and their tax deductible status, which is important for donor reporting.
Click on "Giving Statements" to generate individual donor statements. Select a year and click "Download ZIP" to download individual CSV files for each donor.
You can also click "Print All 3 Statements" to generate a consolidated PDF document with all donor statements for printing.
